tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have been visiting Dr Kapil Rangan for almost 3 years now since 2021 for my mom's heath issue.Dr Kapil is extremely patient, listens carefully and  understands the sign and symptoms and diagnosis perfectly. I still remember the first time when we went for my mother back pain any hospitals dint find the root cause but after consultation with Dr Kapil Rangan he was able to find the root cause in the first consultation itself. I highly recommend doctor to anyone out there looking for heart related issues. He is the best.He has always given the best advise at the right time which has helped my mom a lot. I am extremely thankful to the doctor for all his help.

I had burning sensation in chest so went to hospital. ********* *** **** ** *** ****** *** he was friendly and his behavior was good. ** *** ********* ***** ********. He told it was related to gastric issues. Medicines was prescribed by doctor during consultation for 2 weeks. I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family and friends. Concern was in practo it was showing Rs 600 amount but in hospital I they asked extra amount Rs 750. Even I had shared it to Practo support team with all details, but I didnt get response still. They told it's not updated. Doctor was friendly. He told to avoid spicy food and do workout.

Had visited recently, there is no much waiting time. Tests are done quickly
Doctor is good, he is attentive, listens carefully to understand the symptoms by asking questions. 
Maintains the calm environment while conducting the tests and checking the reports.
Overall the consultation is good and recommended.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
After waiting for over an hour for my appointment, I got about 10 minutes with the doctor. There were other senior patients ahead of me that took a long time for consultation. The doctor seemed very pressed for time even though he was very friendly and knowledgeable. I wanted a fresh opinion on my medical situation, but I didn't get the time to tell a bit about my medical history on palpitations.  After paying 750 for my appintment just like the other patients, I just got a hurried consultation. There were many health check patients consulting the same doctor. 

I don't ask for a long drawn consultation, but I should atleast get to put forward my medical situation properly. Not visiting here again.

I had health issue so went to hospital. Doctor was good in consulting me. Painkiller was prescribed by doctor during consultation. Medical tests were done in the hospital like ECG and echo. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can surely recommend doctor to my family or friends circle. There was no waiting time in the hospital. It was muscle cramp. Doctor was friendly. Yoga was suggested in morning.

My wife had consulted the doctor and it was for general checkup. ****** *** **** ** *********** I would like to recommend the doctor to many people. There was no waiting time when we went. 2D echo test was done. Doctor was friendly. Hospitality was good.

I had met the doctor and it was for chest pain because of gastric issues. Consultation was fine by the doctor. I can surely recommend doctor to my family or friends circle. There was waiting time when we went. It was for 30 minutes. Scanning was done. Doctor was friendly. I am satisfied with the explanation and treatment given.

I had consulted the doctor and it was for acidity and severe chest pain related. ****** *** ********** **** ** ********** *** I can surely recommend doctor to my family or friends circle. There was less waiting time when we went. ECG, echo treadmill tests was done. Brisk walking was suggested and doctor was friendly.

I had visited the hospital and it was heart related issue. Consultation was fine by the doctor. I would like to recommend the doctor to many people. There was no waiting time when we went.  Medicines was prescribed by doctor during consultation. Tests was done. Doctor was friendly.

My mother in law had consulted the doctor and it was for chest pain* ****** *** **** ** ********** *** I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family or friends. Medicine was prescribed by doctor during consultation. There was waiting time in the hospital when we went. It was for 20 minutes. Doctor was very friendly. He refereed another doctor as her condition was different as open heart surgery was to be done in Jayadeva.
